com.netflix.genie.web.scripts

Class ExecutionModeFilterScript

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.web.scripts.ManagedScript
      • com.netflix.genie.web.scripts.ExecutionModeFilterScript

  • public class ExecutionModeFilterScript
extends ManagedScript
    Implementation of ManagedScript that delegates selection of a job's execution mode to a script, thus allowing fine-grained blacklisting/whitelisting when it comes to execution mode. See also: JobExecutionModeSelector.

    The contract between the script and the Java code is that the script will be supplied global variables jobRequest which will be JSON strings representing job request that kicked off this evaluation. The code expects the script to either return the true (to force agent execution), false (to force legacy/embedded execution) or null (for no preference).

    Since:
    4.0.0

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Optional<java.lang.Boolean> forceAgentExecution(JobRequest jobRequest)
      Evaluate the script and return true if this job should be forced to execute via agent, false if it should be forced to execute in embedded mode, null if the script decides not explicitly flag this job for one or the other execution mode.

    • Method Detail

      • forceAgentExecution

        public java.util.Optional<java.lang.Boolean> forceAgentExecution(JobRequest jobRequest)
                                                          throws ScriptNotConfiguredException,
                                                                 ScriptExecutionException
        Evaluate the script and return true if this job should be forced to execute via agent, false if it should be forced to execute in embedded mode, null if the script decides not explicitly flag this job for one or the other execution mode.
        Parameters:
        jobRequest - the job request
        Returns:
        An optional boolean value
        Throws:
        ScriptNotConfiguredException - if the script is not yet successfully loaded and compiled
        ScriptExecutionException - if the script evaluation produces an error
